verses.verse: Hear<WH8085> my prayer,<WH8605> Yahweh!<WH3068> Let my cry<WH7775> come to you.<WH935>
Don't<WH5641> hide your face<WH6440> from me in the day<WH3117> of my distress.<WH6862> Turn<WH5186> your ear<WH241> to me.<WH6030> Answer me quickly<WH4118> in the day<WH3117> when I call.<WH7121>
For my days<WH3117> consume<WH3615> away like smoke.<WH6227> My bones<WH6106> are burned<WH2787> as a torch.<WH4168>
My heart<WH3820> is blighted<WH5221> like grass,<WH6212> and withered,<WH3001> for I forget<WH7911> to eat<WH398> my bread.<WH3899>
By reason of the voice<WH6963> of my groaning,<WH585> my bones<WH6106> stick to my skin.<WH1320>
I am like<WH1819> a pelican<WH6893> of the wilderness.<WH4057> I have become as an owl<WH3563> of the waste places.<WH2723>
I watch,<WH8245> and have become like a sparrow<WH6833> that is alone<WH909> on the housetop.<WH1406>
My enemies<WH341> reproach<WH2778> me all day.<WH3117> Those who are mad<WH1984> at me use my name as a curse.<WH7650>
For I have eaten<WH398> ashes<WH665> like bread,<WH3899> and mixed<WH4537> my drink<WH8249> with tears,<WH1065>
Because<WH6440> of your indignation<WH2195> and your wrath,<WH7110> for you have taken me up,<WH5375> and thrown me away.<WH7993>
My days<WH3117> are like a long<WH5186> shadow.<WH6738> I have withered<WH3001> like grass.<WH6212>
But you,<WH3068> Yahweh, will remain<WH3427> forever;<WH5769> your renown endures<WH3427> to all<WH1755> generations.<WH1755>
You will arise<WH6965> and have mercy<WH7355> on Zion;<WH6726> for it is time<WH6256> to have pity<WH2603> on her.<WH4150> Yes, the set time has come.<WH935>
For your servants<WH5650> take pleasure<WH7521> in her stones,<WH68> and have pity<WH2603> on her dust.<WH6083>
So the nations<WH1471> will fear<WH3372> the name<WH8034> of Yahweh;<WH3068> all the kings<WH4428> of the earth<WH776> your glory.<WH3519>
For Yahweh<WH3068> has built up<WH1129> Zion.<WH6726> He has appeared<WH7200> in his glory.<WH3519>
He has responded<WH6437> to the prayer<WH8605> of the destitute,<WH6199> and has not despised<WH959> their prayer.<WH8605>
This will be written<WH3789> for the generation<WH1755> to come.<WH314> A people<WH5971> which will be created<WH1254> will praise<WH1984> Yah.<WH3050>
For he has looked down<WH8259> from the height<WH4791> of his sanctuary.<WH6944> From heaven,<WH8064> Yahweh<WH3068> saw<WH5027> the earth;<WH776>
to hear<WH8085> the groans<WH603> of the prisoner;<WH615> to free<WH6605> those who are condemned<WH1121> to death;<WH8546>
that men may declare<WH5608> the name<WH8034> of Yahweh<WH3068> in Zion,<WH6726> and his praise<WH8416> in Jerusalem;<WH3389>
when the peoples<WH5971> are gathered<WH6908> together,<WH3162> the kingdoms,<WH4467> to serve<WH5647> Yahweh.<WH3068>
He weakened<WH6031> my strength<WH3581> along the course.<WH1870> He shortened<WH7114> my days.<WH3117>
I said,<WH559> "My God,<WH410> don't<WH5927> take me away in the midst<WH2677> of my days.<WH3117> Your years<WH8141> are throughout all<WH1755> generations.<WH1755>
Of old,<WH6440> you laid the foundation<WH3245> of the earth.<WH776> The heavens<WH8064> are the work<WH4639> of your hands.<WH3027>
They will perish,<WH6> but you will endure.<WH5975> Yes,<WH1086> all of them will wear out like a garment.<WH899> You will change<WH2498> them like a cloak,<WH3830> and they will be changed.<WH2498>
But you are the same.<WH8141> Your years will have no end.<WH8552>
The children<WH1121> of your servants<WH5650> will continue.<WH7931> Their seed<WH2233> will be established<WH3559> before you.<WH6440>"
